comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Phyllis Neilson-Terry was an English actress. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phyllis_Neilson-Terry She played Elizabeth I in "Drake" by Louis N. Parker in this time period. In 1912 and again in 1914, according to NYT, September 6, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9804E2D9153FE233A... Her first American appearance was as Viola in Twelfth Night on November 23, 1914. See NYT from Nov 24, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9502E6DE153AE633A... Phyllis has two "l"s
